Reset Reason

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x40
Size:
0x4

Description

Indicates to ROM the originating cause for the PC to be reset to 0. Only reset during cold-boot (sticky).
Caliptra Access: RO
SOC Access: RO

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:2] - - - -
[1] WARM_RESET r 0x0 -
[0] FW_UPD_RESET r 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

WARM_RESET

warm reset has been executed

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_pwrgood

FW_UPD_RESET

FW update reset has been executed

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b
